Title: Relates to requiring disclosure of types of replacement parts used in automobile collision repairs
Summary: Requires motor vehicle repair shops to disclose types of replacement parts used in automobile collision repairs and provides a disclosure form to be signed by the owner consenting to the use of any such parts; forbids use of any other parts except new original equipment manufacturer parts on any vehicle during the first year of its manufacture and for the two years following.
LawCode: Amd ยง398-d, V & T L; amd ยง3411, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring types of replacement crash parts used in automobile collision repairs be disclosed to vehicle owners and written authorization to use specified parts be obtained prior to installation
